definition: to engage in (business etc)/to run/to operate
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
to build up an enterprise through painstaking efforts

pinyin: jing1 ying2 guan3 li3 he2 wei2 hu4

sentences.english: We stand for independent management of export and import transactions under unified leadership.
sentences.chinese: 我們主張分頭經營，統一領導。

sentences.english: We also do import and export business in chemicals and agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司還經營化學產品和家產品進出口的業務。

sentences.english: My small business operates on a razor-thin profit margin.
sentences.chinese: 我的生意屬小本經營，利潤微薄。

sentences.english: Our company is an enterprise which is invested by Hong Kong investor only and manages businesses independently.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是港商獨資企業，自主經營進出口業務。

sentences.english: These strategies include buying raw materials in bulk and by mechanizing their operations.
sentences.chinese: 這些策略包括購買原材料和散裝機械化經營。

sentences.english: The key account manager must possess significant skill to run a multi-million dollar business.
sentences.chinese: 大客戶經理須具備經營數百萬美元生意的重要技能。

sentences.english: Stock company is the form of realization of state-owned enterprises at the operational level.
sentences.chinese: 股份制企業是國有企業在經營層次上的實現形式。

sentences.english: Shen Zou operates mines in China that excavate fluorite and other minerals.
sentences.chinese: 申走在中國經營螢石礦，挖掘和其他礦物質。

sentences.english: An enterprise as a legal person shall conduct operations within the range approved and registered.
sentences.chinese: 企業法人應當在覈准登記的經營範圍內從事經營。

sentences.english: An enterprise as a legal person shall conduct operations within the range approved and registered.
sentences.chinese: 企業法人應當在覈准登記的經營範圍內從事經營。

sentences.english: It's also an issue of exclusivity.
sentences.chinese: 這也是一個獨家經營權問題。

sentences.english: Suntory is a private, family-run firm.
sentences.chinese: 而三得利是一傢俬營的，家族經營的公司。

sentences.english: The old man provided an idea for his son on how to run a restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 這位老人就如何經營飯店給他的兒子支招兒。

sentences.english: Through bad operation, the company had a slump in profits.
sentences.chinese: 由於經營不善，公司利潤驟降。

sentences.english: The result is that many have jeopardized their performance in the long run.
sentences.chinese: 結果就使得他們在長遠經營中蒙受一定的損失。

sentences.english: Slope orchard in arid area is the main forestry manage model on Loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 坡地旱作果園是我國黃土區坡面主要農林業經營形式。

definition: running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
to be in operation/to do business/(of train, bus etc) to be in service/operation/service
to go for/to engage in/to undertake/to deal with/to handle/to do
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
to offer (goods or services)/to open (for business etc)
to exploit (a resource)/to open up (for development)/to develop
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
